channel.title: Blog on Donia Chaiehloudj
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Donia Chaiehloudj

item.title: 2022: Time to Harvest
item.description: A reflection on 2022 - a year of community building, public speaking, and personal growth. Discussing accomplishments, challenges, and learnings from a transformative year.

item.title: My GopherCon Europe 2022 Highlights
item.description: A detailed recap of my first conference talk experience at GopherCon Europe 2022 in Berlin - from preparation to delivery, including talks attended and amazing people met.

item.title: Behind the scenes of the GDG Sophia-Antipolis
item.description: A look behind the scenes of founding and running the Google Developer Group Sophia-Antipolis - building a tech community in the south of France.

item.title: My Top 5 Women Motivational Speakers in Cloud-Native Development
item.description: Bringing the importance of role models and sharing my top 5 women speakers in cloud-native development - CNCF ambassadors, Docker captains, and AWS heroes inspiring the next generation.

item.title: ChangeBlogging my first Hacktoberfest 2021
item.description: Walking through one month of my open source contributions during Hacktoberfest 2021 - overcoming fears, making first contributions, and discovering the rewarding world of open source.

item.title: 10 concepts you should know about distributed systems
item.description: A brief lexicon of cloud computing main principles - covering availability, scalability, load balancing, caching, replication, sharding, monitoring, and observability.
